StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateRankMOS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @Rank varchar(10), @PrimaryMOS varchar(10) = NULL, @BilletMOS varchar(10) = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @PayGrade varchar(3)
DECLARE @TranType varchar(6) DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
--- DEFINE PAY GRADE SELECT @PayGrade = COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 PAY_GRADE_CODE FROM PAY_GRADE WHERE RANK_CODE = @Rank ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE ASC), SPACE(0))
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MARINE WHERE MARINE_ID = @PersonID) BEGIN SET @TranType = 'update'
--- UPDATE MARINE RECORD UPDATE MARINE SET PRESENT_GRADE_CODE = @PayGrade, PRIMARY_MOS = COALESCE(@PrimaryMOS, PRIMARY_MOS), BILLET_MOS = COALESCE(@BilletMOS, BILLET_MOS), USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_ID = @PersonID END ELSE BEGIN SET @TranType = 'add'
--- INSERT MARINE RECORD INSERT INTO MARINE (MARINE_ID, PRESENT_GRADE_CODE, PRIMARY_MOS, BILLET_MOS, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@PersonID, @PayGrade, @PrimaryMOS, @BilletMOS, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
IF @@ROWCOUNT != 1 OR @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'Failure to ' + @TranType + ' Rank/MOS data.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
